function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of multiple measures simultaneously without clear evaluation","Impact":"Increased difficulty in identifying the most effective containment measures","Mitigation":"Conduct clear evaluations of the effectiveness of individual measures before introducing new ones","Technologies":"Data analysis and statistical modeling to assess the impact of individual measures","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of travel bans in reducing COVID-19 cases outside Wuhan and Hubei","Impact":"Ineffective use of resources and implementation of measures","Mitigation":"Evaluate the timing and necessity of travel bans and consider alternative containment strategies","Technologies":"Data analysis of travel patterns and disease spread, simulation modeling","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unclear replication of control measures and effectiveness outside China","Impact":"Uncertainty in the ability to contain the spread of COVID-19 in other regions","Mitigation":"Conduct controlled experiments and studies to assess the effectiveness of control measures in different contexts","Technologies":"Global data sharing, collaborative research, simulation modeling","People":"Global public health community, policymakers","Owner":"International health organizations, research institutions"}]}
